commands.name: ccw-coordinator

commands.name: ccw-debug
commands.description: Debug coordinator - analyze issue, select debug strategy, execute debug workflow in main process

commands.name: cli-init
commands.description: Generate .gemini/ and .qwen/ config directories with settings.json and ignore files based on workspace technology detection

commands.name: codex-review
commands.description: Interactive code review using Codex CLI via ccw endpoint with configurable review target, model, and custom instructions

commands.name: codex-coordinator
commands.description: Command orchestration tool for Codex - analyze requirements, recommend command chain, execute sequentially with state persistence

commands.name: convert-to-plan
commands.description: Convert planning artifacts (lite-plan, workflow session, markdown) to issue solutions

commands.name: issue:discover-by-prompt
commands.description: Discover issues from user prompt with Gemini-planned iterative multi-agent exploration. Uses ACE semantic search for context gathering and supports cross-module comparison (e.g., frontend vs backend API contracts).
commands.allowed_tools_csv: Skill(*), TodoWrite(*), Read(*), Bash(*), Task(*), AskUserQuestion(*), Glob(*), Grep(*), mcp__ace-tool__search_context(*), mcp__exa__search(*)

commands.name: issue:discover
commands.description: Discover potential issues from multiple perspectives (bug, UX, test, quality, security, performance, maintainability, best-practices) using CLI explore. Supports Exa external research for security and best-practices perspectives.
commands.allowed_tools_csv: Skill(*), TodoWrite(*), Read(*), Bash(*), Task(*), AskUserQuestion(*), Glob(*), Grep(*)

commands.name: execute
commands.description: Execute queue with DAG-based parallel orchestration (one commit per solution)

commands.name: from-brainstorm
commands.description: Convert brainstorm session ideas into issue with executable solution for parallel-dev-cycle
commands.allowed_tools_csv: TodoWrite(*), Bash(*), Read(*), Write(*), Glob(*), AskUserQuestion(*)

commands.name: new
commands.description: Create structured issue from GitHub URL or text description

commands.name: plan
commands.description: Batch plan issue resolution using issue-plan-agent (explore + plan closed-loop)
commands.allowed_tools_csv: TodoWrite(*), Task(*), Skill(*), AskUserQuestion(*), Bash(*), Read(*), Write(*)

commands.name: queue
commands.description: Form execution queue from bound solutions using issue-queue-agent (solution-level)

commands.name: compact
commands.description: Compact current session memory into structured text for session recovery, extracting objective/plan/files/decisions/constraints/state, and save via MCP core_memory tool

commands.name: docs-full-cli
commands.description: Generate full project documentation using CLI execution (Layer 3→1) with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <20 modules uses direct parallel

commands.name: docs-related-cli
commands.description: Generate/update documentation for git-changed modules using CLI execution with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <15 modules uses direct parallel

commands.name: load
commands.description: Delegate to universal-executor agent to analyze project via Gemini/Qwen CLI and return JSON core content package for task context

commands.name: style-skill-memory
commands.description: Generate SKILL memory package from style reference for easy loading and consistent design system usage

commands.name: tips
commands.description: Quick note-taking command to capture ideas, snippets, reminders, and insights for later reference

commands.name: update-full
commands.description: Update all CLAUDE.md files using layer-based execution (Layer 3→1) with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <20 modules uses direct parallel

commands.name: update-related
commands.description: Update CLAUDE.md for git-changed modules using batched agent execution (4 modules/agent) with gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <15 modules uses direct execution

commands.name: execute
commands.description: Coordinate agent execution for workflow tasks with automatic session discovery, parallel task processing, and status tracking

commands.name: init-guidelines
commands.description: Interactive wizard to fill project-guidelines.json based on project analysis

commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize project-level state with intelligent project analysis using cli-explore-agent

commands.name: lite-execute
commands.description: Execute tasks based on in-memory plan, prompt description, or file content

commands.name: lite-fix
commands.description: Lightweight bug diagnosis and fix workflow with intelligent severity assessment and optional hotfix mode for production incidents

commands.name: lite-plan
commands.description: Lightweight interactive planning workflow with in-memory planning, code exploration, and execution execute to lite-execute after user confirmation

commands.name: workflow:multi-cli-plan
commands.description: Multi-CLI collaborative planning workflow with ACE context gathering and iterative cross-verification. Uses cli-discuss-agent for Gemini+Codex+Claude analysis to converge on optimal execution plan.
commands.allowed_tools_csv: TodoWrite(*), Task(*), AskUserQuestion(*), Read(*), Bash(*), Write(*), mcp__ace-tool__search_context(*)

commands.name: plan-verify
commands.description: Perform READ-ONLY verification analysis between IMPL_PLAN.md, task JSONs, and brainstorming artifacts. Generates structured report with quality gate recommendation. Does NOT modify any files.

commands.name: plan
commands.description: 5-phase planning workflow with action-planning-agent task generation, outputs IMPL_PLAN.md and task JSONs

commands.name: replan
commands.description: Interactive workflow replanning with session-level artifact updates and boundary clarification through guided questioning
commands.allowed_tools_csv: Read(*), Write(*), Edit(*), TodoWrite(*), Glob(*), Bash(*)

commands.name: review-cycle-fix
commands.description: Automated fixing of code review findings with AI-powered planning and coordinated execution. Uses intelligent grouping, multi-stage timeline coordination, and test-driven verification.
commands.allowed_tools_csv: Skill(*), TodoWrite(*), Read(*), Bash(*), Task(*), Edit(*), Write(*)

commands.name: review-module-cycle
commands.description: Independent multi-dimensional code review for specified modules/files. Analyzes specific code paths across 7 dimensions with hybrid parallel-iterative execution, independent of workflow sessions.

commands.name: review-session-cycle
commands.description: Session-based comprehensive multi-dimensional code review. Analyzes git changes from workflow session across 7 dimensions with hybrid parallel-iterative execution, aggregates findings, and performs focused deep-dives on critical issues until quality gates met.

commands.name: review
commands.description: Post-implementation review with specialized types (security/architecture/action-items/quality) using analysis agents and Gemini

commands.name: complete
commands.description: Mark active workflow session as complete, archive with lessons learned, update manifest, remove active flag

commands.name: list
commands.description: List all workflow sessions with status filtering, shows session metadata and progress information

commands.name: resume
commands.description: Resume the most recently paused workflow session with automatic session discovery and status update

commands.name: solidify
commands.description: Crystallize session learnings and user-defined constraints into permanent project guidelines

commands.name: start
commands.description: Discover existing sessions or start new workflow session with intelligent session management and conflict detection

commands.name: tdd-plan
commands.description: TDD workflow planning with Red-Green-Refactor task chain generation, test-first development structure, and cycle tracking

commands.name: tdd-verify
commands.description: Verify TDD workflow compliance against Red-Green-Refactor cycles. Generates quality report with coverage analysis and quality gate recommendation. Orchestrates sub-commands for comprehensive validation.
commands.allowed_tools_csv: Skill(*), TodoWrite(*), Read(*), Write(*), Bash(*), Glob(*)

commands.name: test-cycle-execute
commands.description: Execute test-fix workflow with dynamic task generation and iterative fix cycles until test pass rate >= 95% or max iterations reached. Uses @cli-planning-agent for failure analysis and task generation.

commands.name: test-fix-gen
commands.description: Create test-fix workflow session with progressive test layers (L0-L3), AI code validation, and test task generation

commands.name: code-validation-gate
commands.description: Validate AI-generated code for common errors (imports, variables, types) before test execution

commands.name: conflict-resolution
commands.description: Detect and resolve conflicts between plan and existing codebase using CLI-powered analysis with Gemini/Qwen

commands.name: gather
commands.description: Intelligently collect project context using context-search-agent based on task description, packages into standardized JSON

commands.name: task-generate-agent
commands.description: Generate implementation plan documents (IMPL_PLAN.md, task JSONs, TODO_LIST.md) using action-planning-agent - produces planning artifacts, does NOT execute code implementation

commands.name: task-generate-tdd
commands.description: Autonomous TDD task generation using action-planning-agent with Red-Green-Refactor cycles, test-first structure, and cycle validation

commands.name: tdd-coverage-analysis
commands.description: Analyze test coverage and TDD cycle execution with Red-Green-Refactor compliance verification

commands.name: test-concept-enhanced
commands.description: Coordinate test analysis workflow using cli-execution-agent to generate test strategy via Gemini

commands.name: test-context-gather
commands.description: Collect test coverage context using test-context-search-agent and package into standardized test-context JSON

commands.name: test-task-generate
commands.description: Generate test planning documents (IMPL_PLAN.md, test task JSONs, TODO_LIST.md) by invoking test-action-planning-agent
